Articles.Content:
Hi everyone!

I have a request for a kOS script. It's quite unusual. I can't program even if my life depends on it.

It's for an unique project, a first in Kerbal Space Program.

There have been internal combustion engines before but they were static, incredibly slow and fixed to the launchpad.

Mine roam the field and will fly. They're fast and powerful!

I just need one thing: ignition.

A script to time the firing of the cylinders.

Interested?
